select mbr_no as no, mbr_id as username, mbr_nickname as nickname from gl_member where mbr_id like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') limit #{startIndex}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from gl_member where mbr_id like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
select * from gl_loadmap where ldm_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') limit #{startIndex}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from gl_loadmap where ldm_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

select sub1.*, sub2.likeCount from ( ( select gc.*, gm.mbr_nickname from gl_course gc inner join gl_member gm on gc.cos_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') and gc.mbr_no = gm.mbr_no ) sub1 left join ( select cos_no, count(cos_no) as likeCount from gl_course_like group by cos_no ) sub2 on sub1.cos_no = sub2.cos_no )
select count(*) from gl_course where cos_title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
